name: Audio Ninja (itch)
description:
This game was made in 3 days to simulate Game Jam condition but oh boi did we fail miserably due to lazyness, in the end I had to patch it twice on the 4th day for stability but that's it, enjoy what's left of it.

How to Play:

--Controls

W: Jump
S: Crouch
A: Move Left
D: Move Right

Press the Jump Button near a wall to walljump.

ScrollWheel: Control Time with music
Left Click: Melee Attack
Right Click: Ranged Attack

-- Objective:

Kill the Boss at the end of the level to win,
Avoid obstacles and mobs to not die

Warning: Red orbs kill you in 1 shot.

Credits:
